name: Endless Fight (umbrelluck)
description:
History

Among the Sea Of Chaos new world, Mundus, was born. To maintain its stability you - The Hero - were sent to fend of waves of invaders from different realms. Fight as long as you can, for destiny of newborn world depends on you.

How to play

Left part of the screen - for movement (joystick appears when you press)

Tap anywhere on the screen to use ability (right now there are two types: red shield, which attacks enemies and blue one, which is basically shield)
